metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8167 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A CSRF vulnerability exists in rails <= 6.0.3 rails-ujs module that could allow attackers to send CSRF tokens to wrong domains.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:5.2.4.3+dfsg-2').
